tool_description: An API to rapidly retrieve information about drug prices and history across a variety of sources
title: Drug Info and Price History

api_list.name: Drug Info
api_list.description: Returns information about the given drug

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the price history for aspirin?
What is the current price of ibuprofen?
I'd like to know the price trends for paracetamol over the past year.
Could you give me information on the cost of metformin?
What are the historical prices for amoxicillin?
Please provide the price details for atorvastatin.
I need to know the price history of lisinopril.
Can you tell me how much omeprazole costs currently?
What is the price history for levothyroxine?
I'd like to see the price information for simvastatin.

api_list.name: genericname
api_list.description: Given a brand name, returns a generic name

utterances.utterance: What is the generic name for Advil?
Can you tell me the generic name for Tylenol?
I need the generic name for Lipitor.
What's the generic equivalent of Zoloft?
Find the generic name for the drug Nexium.
Could you provide the generic name for Plavix?
What is the generic name for the brand drug Crestor?
Tell me the generic name for the medication Prozac.
I want to know the generic name for the brand name drug Singulair.
Can you find the generic name for the drug Cymbalta?

api_list.name: Price History
api_list.description: Returns an array of price histories when given a valid drug ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drug-info-and-price-history.p.rapidapi.com/1/history"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drug-info-and-price-history.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the price history for the drug with ID 12345?
I need to know the historical prices for the medication identified by ID 67890.
What are the past prices for the drug with the ID 54321?
Could you give me the price history for the drug with ID 98765?
Please show me the price history for the medication with ID 11223.
I'd like to see the historical pricing for the drug with ID 33445.
Can you tell me the price history for the drug identified by ID 55667?
What is the price history for the medication with ID 77889?
I want to know the historical prices for the drug with ID 99001.
Could you provide the price history for the drug with ID 22334?
